====Motion input====
====Motion input====
  +
[[File:Galaxy Nexus smartphone.jpg|thumb|[[Galaxy Nexus]], an example of a smartphone with an built-in accelerometer<ref>http://www.google.com/nexus/#/tech-specs</ref> ]]
Some [[smartphones]], digital audio players and [[personal digital assistants]] contain accelerometers for user interface control; often the accelerometer is used to present [[screen orientation|landscape or portrait views]] of the device's screen, based on the way the device is being held.
